comment.author: 10213344@N07
comment._content: He must be proud of his new farm denims.  You can see the copper buttons shining, not a speck of dirt on the clothes.

comment.author: 23224989@N07
comment._content:
Title:  Pride Goeth In the Fall
The caption says he might be a farmer... do ya think???  The buttons feature red paint and a design I can't make out (looks like a duck head, but I doubt if it's Bass Pro RedHead).  I'll bet someone out there could identify the brand (assuming their not homespun).
